query.statement:
SELECT A1.AREA CS136_ARA, CASE WHEN A1.LGORT = '0000' THEN '총합계' WHEN A1.LGORT = 'YYYY' THEN '소계' WHEN A1.LGORT = 'XXXX' THEN '소계' ELSE A1.AREA_NM END AREA_NM, A1.LGORT CS136_BSU, A1.LIFNR_NM, A1.CS136_HNO, CASE WHEN A1.CS136_HNO = 'G' THEN '' ELSE A1.HNO_NM END HNO_NM, CASE WHEN A1.CS136_GND = 'I' OR A1.CS136_GND = 'J' OR A1.CS136_GND = 'K' THEN '' ELSE A1.GND_NM END GND_NM, A1.CS136_GND, A1.AFLG, A1.BFLG, VALUE(B1.CNT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.CNT_N,0) CNT_A, VALUE(B1.CNT_Y,0) CNT_B, CASE WHEN VALUE(B1.CNT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.CNT_N,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((VALUE(B1.CNT_Y,0) / (VALUE(B1.CNT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.CNT_N,0))) * 100,2) END PER_C, VALUE(B1.AMT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.AMT_N,0) AMT_A, VALUE(B1.AMT_Y,0) AMT_B, CASE WHEN VALUE(B1.AMT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.AMT_N,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((VALUE(B1.AMT_Y,0) / (VALUE(B1.AMT_Y,0) + VALUE(B1.AMT_N,0))) * 100,2) END PER_A FROM ( -- 지역,협력사,제품구분,보수구분(틀) SELECT DISTINCT '00' ARA_GBN, '00' AREA, '' AREA_NM, '' LIFNR_NM, '0000' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD, '' VKGRP FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '5' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '6' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '유상,무상,공사' WHEN 'F' THEN '상주,부품판매' END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '2' END ORD, '5' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 IN ('D','F')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '3' ORD, '6' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT 'YY' ARA_GBN, 'YY' AREA, '' AREA_NM, '' LIFNR_NM, 'YYYY' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD, '' VKGRP FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '4' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '5' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '유상,무상,공사' WHEN 'F' THEN '상주,부품판매' END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '2' END ORD, '4' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 IN ('D','F')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '3' ORD, '5' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT C.AREA||'1' ARA_GBN, C.AREA, C.AREA_NM, '' LIFNR_NM, 'XXXX' LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD, '' VKGRP FROM ( SELECT A.AREA, A.AREA_NM, B.LIFNR, B.LIFNR_NM, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM012A.LIFNR, MM012A.NAME1 LIFNR_NM, MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR AND WB010A.BSU_GB = '3' AND WB010A.USED = '' ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '3' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '지역계' CTEXT2, '4' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '유상,무상,공사' WHEN 'F' THEN '상주,부품판매' END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '2' END ORD, '3' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 IN ('D','F')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '합계' CTEXT2, '3' ORD, '4' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D WHERE C.AREA = 'E5'
UNION ALL
SELECT C.AREA||'0' ARA_GBN, C.AREA, C.AREA_NM, C.LIFNR_NM, C.LGORT, D.CS136_HNO, D.HNO_NM, D.CS136_GND, D.GND_NM, D.AFLG, D.BFLG, D.ORD, C.VKGRP FROM ( SELECT A.AREA, A.AREA_NM, B.LIFNR_NM, B.LGORT, B.VKGRP FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA, MM028A.CTEXT2 AREA_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM012A.LIFNR, MM012A.NAME1 LIFNR_NM, MM012A.J_1KFREPRE CNAME, MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA, WB010A.VKGRP FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR AND WB010A.BSU_GB = '3' AND WB010A.USED = '' ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ) C, ( SELECT A.CODE2 CS136_HNO, A.CTEXT2 HNO_NM, B.CODE2 CS136_GND, B.CTEXT2 GND_NM, A.AFLG, B.BFLG, B.ORD FROM ( SELECT CODE2, CTEXT2, '1' AFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS131' AND MM028A.CODE2 = 'A'
UNION
SELECT 'G' CODE2, '협력사계' CTEXT2, '2' AFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A, ( SELECT MM028B.CODE2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '유상,무상,공사' WHEN 'F' THEN '상주,부품판매' END CTEXT2, CASE MM028B.CODE2 WHEN 'D' THEN '1' WHEN 'F' THEN '2' END ORD, '1' BFLG FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028B WHERE MM028B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028B.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028B.CODE1 = 'CS135' AND MM028B.CODE2 > 'A' AND MM028B.CODE2 IN ('D','F')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' CODE2, '계' CTEXT2, '' ORD, '2' BFLG FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B WHERE A.AFLG = B.BFLG ORDER BY A.CODE2, B.ORD ) D ) A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CNT_Y) CNT_Y, SUM(CNT_N) CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( -- 보수구분별계 SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, CNT_Y, CNT_N, AMT_Y, AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'D' CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_N, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 A ON A.MANDT = CS136A.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = CS136A.CS136_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = CS136A.CS136_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = CS136A.CS136_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = CS136A.CS136_HNO AND A.CS126_SEQ = CS136A.CS136_SEQ AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND VALUE(A.CS126_SLA,'N') = 'N' AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B','C','D') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','J','G') GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_JYN
UNION ALL
SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'F' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3', SAPHEE.VBAK VB WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND CS136A.CS136_GND = 'E' AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) = 'Z' AND VALUE(CS131A.MANDT,'') = VB.MANDT AND '00' || VALUE(CS131A.VBELN,'') = VB.VBELN AND VB.SPART IN ('10','20','40') GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'F' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.GUBUN IN ('1','2') GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) H
UNION ALL
-- 협력사계(계) SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CNT_Y) CNT_Y, SUM(CNT_N) CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, SUM(CNT_Y) CNT_Y, SUM(CNT_N) CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'D' CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_N, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 A ON A.MANDT = CS136A.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = CS136A.CS136_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = CS136A.CS136_CST AND A.CS126_PJT = CS136A.CS136_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = CS136A.CS136_HNO AND A.CS126_SEQ = CS136A.CS136_SEQ AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND VALUE(A.CS126_SLA,'N') = 'N' AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND CS136A.CS136_GND IN ('A','B','C','D') AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','J','G') GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, CS136A.CS136_JYN ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'F' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3', SAPHEE.VBAK VB WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '') AND CS136A.CS136_GND = 'E' AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) = 'Z' AND VALUE(CS131A.MANDT,'') = VB.MANDT AND '00' || VALUE(CS131A.VBELN,'') = VB.VBELN AND VB.SPART IN ('10','20','40') GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.GUBUN IN ('1','2') GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) B GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND
UNION ALL
-- 서울 지역계 SELECT CS136_ARA, 'XXXX' CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND, SUM(CNT_Y) CNT_Y, SUM(CNT_N) CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'D' CS136_GND, SUM(CNT_Y) CNT_Y, SUM(CNT_N) CNT_N, SUM(AMT_Y) AMT_Y, SUM(AMT_N) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'D' CS136_GND, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT_N, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = 'Y' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_Y, CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_JYN = '' THEN VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) ELSE 0 END AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SELECT 'TOT' TOT, CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, SUM(DOUBLE(AMT_Y)) AMT_Y, SUM(DOUBLE(AMT_N)) AMT_N FROM ( SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU, 'A' CS136_HNO, 'F' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, VALUE(SUM(CS136A.CS136_BAM)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY1)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY2)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY3)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_IY4)+SUM(CS136A.CS136_RET),0) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_GND = CS131A.CS131_GND AND CS136A.CS136_JYM = CS131A.CS131_MYM AND CS136A.CS136_UPN = CS131A.CS131_UPN AND CS136A.CS136_CST = CS131A.CS131_CST AND CS136A.CS136_PJT = CS131A.CS131_PJT AND CS136A.CS136_HNO = CS131A.CS131_HNO AND CS136A.CS136_SEQ = CS131A.CS131_SEQ AND CS136A.CS136_ISR = CS131A.CS131_ISR AND CS131A.CS131_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_BSU LIKE '_%' AND CS131A.CS131_GBU = '3', ( SELECT A.AREA, B.LGORT FROM ( SELECT MM028A.CODE2 AREA FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028A WHERE MM028A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM028A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028A.CODE1 = 'CS115' ) A, ( SELECT MM005A.LGORT, WB010A.BSU_ARA FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND MM012A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND MM012A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR ) B WHERE A.AREA = B.BSU_ARA ORDER BY A.AREA, B.LGORT ) ARA_BSU, SAPHEE.VBAK VB WHERE CS136A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136A.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND CS136A.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136A.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136A.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136A.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136_ARA = ARA_BSU.AREA AND CS136_BSU = ARA_BSU.LGORT AND CS136A.CS136_ARA LIKE '_%' AND CS136A.CS136_BSU LIKE '_%' AND (CS131A.CS131_MYB IS NULL OR CS131A.CS131_MYB = '') AND (CS131A.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131A.VBELN > '')
AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = #AREA#
AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = #LIFNR#
AND CS136A.CS136_GND = 'E' AND SUBSTR(CS136A.CS136_HNO,1,1) = 'Z' AND VALUE(CS131A.MANDT,'') = VB.MANDT AND '00' || VALUE(CS131A.VBELN,'') = VB.VBELN AND VB.SPART IN ('10','20','40') GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA, CS136A.CS136_BSU ) A GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU
UNION ALL
SELECT 'TOT' TOT, WB010.BSU_ARA CS136_ARA, WB010.LGORT CS136_BSU, 'G' CS136_HNO, 'H' CS136_GND, 0 CNT_Y, 0 CNT_N, SUM(MM034.DMBTR) AMT_Y, 0 AMT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_ARA > '' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB' AND MM034.GUBUN IN ('1','2')
AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #AREA#
AND WB010.LGORT = #LIFNR#
GROUP BY WB010.BSU_ARA, WB010.LGORT ) B GROUP BY CS136_HNO, CS136_GND ) TOT GROUP BY CS136_ARA, CS136_BSU, CS136_HNO, CS136_GND ) B1 ON A1.AREA = B1.CS136_ARA AND A1.LGORT = B1.CS136_BSU AND A1.CS136_HNO = B1.CS136_HNO AND A1.CS136_GND = B1.CS136_GND WHERE 1=1
AND (A1.AREA = #AREA# OR A1.AREA = '00')
AND A1.LGORT = #LIFNR#
ORDER BY A1.ARA_GBN, A1.VKGRP, A1.LGORT, A1.CS136_HNO, A1.ORD WITH UR
